title: Lizard
description: Hip openers, Standing Primary body parts engaged Glutes & Hip Flexors, Hamstrings Ankles, Knees, Quadriceps, Spine Opens hips, groins and hamstrings Stretches abdominal organs How to perform Lizard Begin in Downward Facing Dog. Reach your right leg toward the sky with an inhale. Place your right foot outside of your right hand with an exhale. Lower your elbows to the floor underneath your shoulders, forearms parallel. Check that your right knee is aligned over your ankle.
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
